interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Big Bang Theory: The Twelfth and Final Season [DVD]
Review Date: 2019/12/18
Store: Johnny Galecki  (Actor),     Jim Parsons  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy
Product Description: ['The Big Bang Theory: The Twelfth and Final Season: Leonard and Sheldon are brilliant physicists – geniuses in the laboratory but socially challenged everywhere else. Enter beautiful, street-smart neighbor Penny, who aims to teach them a thing or two about life. Despite their on-again, off-again relationship in the past, Leonard and Penny have finally gotten married. Even Sheldon has found a female companion, entering into a “relationship agreement” with neurobiologist Amy Farrah Fowler, and he recently took their relationship to the next level by marrying her after a long courtship. In their free time, Leonard and Sheldon enjoy fantasy role-playing games with their ever-expanding universe of friends, including fellow scientists Raj, Howard and Howard’s adorable microbiologist wife, Bernadette, who is adjusting to life with their two children.']
Average Rating: 4.9
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Comedy', 'Format': 'Subtitled, NTSC, DVD', 'Contributor': 'Steve Holland, Bill Prady, Maria Ferrari, Steve Hollander, Jim Parsons, Kunal Nayyar, Simon Helberg, Dave Goetsch, Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco, Mayim Bialik, Melissa Rauch, Steven Molaro, Eric Kaplan, Chuck LorreSteve Holland, Bill Prady, Maria Ferrari, Steve Hollander, Jim Parsons, Kunal Nayyar, Simon Helberg, Dave Goetsch, Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco, Mayim Bialik, Melissa Rauch, Steven Molaro, Eric Kaplan, Chuck Lorre  See more', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Number Of Discs': '3', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 4.96 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'Subtitled, NTSC, DVD', 'Run time': '2 hours and 4 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 12, 2019', 'Actors': 'Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco, Simon Helberg, Kunal Nayyar', 'Subtitles': 'English, French, Spanish', 'Producers': 'Chuck Lorre, Steven Molaro, Bill Prady, Steve Hollander, Steve Holland', 'Studio': 'Studio Distribution Services', 'Number of discs': '3'}
Review Text: This show is a riot of fun and yet quite insightful often times. Love the characters!
Review Title: Witty and somewhat wacky comedy.
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
Sing
Matthew McConaughey  (Actor),     Reese Witherspoon  (Actor),     Garth Jennings  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Comedy
["From Illumination Entertainment, the studio that brought you The Secret Life of Pets comes an animated comedy about finding the music that lives inside all of us. Sing stars Academy Award winner Matthew McConaughey as Buster Moon, an eternally optimistic koala who puts on the world's greatest singing competition to save his crumbling theater; Academy Award winner Reese Witherspoon as Rosita, an overworked and underappreciated mother of 25 piglets desperate to unleash her inner diva; Scarlett Johansson as Ash, a punk rock porcupine with a beautiful voice behind her prickly exterior; and Taron Egerton as Johnny, a young gangster gorilla looking to break free of his family's felonies. Sing is the musical comedy event of the year!Bonus Content:", 'The Making of Sing', 'The Making of Sing', 'Finding the Rhythm: Editing Sing', 'Finding the Rhythm: Editing Sing', 'Character Profiles', 'Character Profiles', '"Don\'t You Worry \'Bout a Thing" Music Video', '"Don\'t You Worry \'Bout a Thing" Music Video', 'Making a Music Video with Tori Kelly', 'Making a Music Video with Tori Kelly', '"Faith" Music Video', '"Faith" Music Video', '"Faith" Lyric Video', '"Faith" Lyric Video', '"Set\xa0It All Free" Lyric Video', '"Set\xa0It All Free" Lyric Video', 'Sing & Dance! - "Faith"', 'Sing & Dance! - "Faith"', 'The Sing Network', 'The Sing Network', 'The Best of Gunter', 'The Best of Gunter', '"Gunter Babysits" Mini-Movie', '"Gunter Babysits" Mini-Movie', '"Love At First Sight" Mini-Movie', '"Love At First Sight" Mini-Movie', '"Eddie\'s Life Coach" Mini Movie', '"Eddie\'s Life Coach" Mini Movie', 'The Making of the Mini-Movies', 'The Making of the Mini-Movies']

Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Comedy
['The Big Bang Theory: The Twelfth and Final Season: Leonard and Sheldon are brilliant physicists – geniuses in the laboratory but socially challenged everywhere else. Enter beautiful, street-smart neighbor Penny, who aims to teach them a thing or two about life. Despite their on-again, off-again relationship in the past, Leonard and Penny have finally gotten married. Even Sheldon has found a female companion, entering into a “relationship agreement” with neurobiologist Amy Farrah Fowler, and he recently took their relationship to the next level by marrying her after a long courtship. In their free time, Leonard and Sheldon enjoy fantasy role-playing games with their ever-expanding universe of friends, including fellow scientists Raj, Howard and Howard’s adorable microbiologist wife, Bernadette, who is adjusting to life with their two children.']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Main Interests:** Animated family movies, comedies, television shows, musicals, and performing arts.
- **Preferred Content:** Enjoys engaging, light-hearted stories with musical elements, relatable characters, and witty humor. 
- **Audience Engagement:** Seeks out entertainment suitable for all ages, indicating a strong family-oriented viewing preference that includes humorous shows as well as films.
- **Rating Behavior:** Maintains a high ratings average (4.8 overall) and recently awarded a perfect score to a comedy series, reflecting a consistent appreciation for quality storytelling and character development.
- **Purchase Patterns:** Continues to show a preference for acquiring products that offer enjoyment and shareable experiences, especially within animated features and now includes comedic television series.
- **Community Engagement:** Engages with content showcasing notable actors, directors, and acclaimed production teams, affirming a preference for well-known talent.

Overall, this user favors uplifting and entertaining narratives, including both films and series that can be enjoyed by themselves and others, particularly family-oriented and humorous productions featuring relatable characters and insightful storytelling.
